channel.title: Just a few polls for you!
channel.description:
Hello there, today I have five polls for you. I am also curious how this will turn out.
<big>What is your favorite type of genre of music? [poll type=regular results=always public=true chartType=bar] * Everything * Electronic [Including DnB] * Jazz/Classical * Other [/poll] <big>How much do you like Auxy? [poll name=poll2 type=number results=always min=1 max=5 step=1 public=true] [/poll] <big>Do you like soft music or loud music? [poll name=poll3 type=regular results=always public=true chartType=bar] * Soft music * Loud music [/poll] <big>What do you think about your own music? [poll name=poll4 type=regular results=always public=true chartType=bar] * I am doing pretty good * I am not so confident about how I am doing * Don’t know * I do not know what to say [/poll] <big>What is your favorite kind of melodic instrument? [poll name=poll5 type=regular results=always public=true chartType=bar] * Pluck/Mallet * Orchestral * Lead * Bass * Pad [/poll]

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Crumbly
item.description:
you could electronically reproduce a jazz song, but it’s not electronic music, or it could be. Such a terrible word encompassing almost any frigging thing you do on a computer.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Crumbly
item.description:
correct

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: sp33chl3ss
item.description:
I am pretty sure Electronic as a genre is signified by the primary focus on the synthesized instrumentals of a song. This differs from the vocally dependent genres of hip hop/pop/rap, and from the organic/analog/acoustic dependence of most other genres.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Aadam
item.description:
I will change it to melodic instruments

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.description:
@Aadam the last poll is broken because it has no option for d r u m s

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Aadam
item.description:
@Hum4n01d, maybe you are right the entire time.

Yes, electronic is a type of music, but also a genre.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
I have seen tracks labeled as “electronic”. Granted it might be that someone didn’t want to specify, but i doubt it since the same artists would also put labels like “electro”, “synthwave”, house etc under their other tracks. (example: F.O.O.L)
Tho i do think that most people tend to use it to label stuff that doesnt fall into a specific category, people like FOOL have used it more to label their “sound”/style

dont know if that answer makes any sense.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
How though??? I mean that just doesn’t make sense to me. How can something be stylistically electronic

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.description:
All Corvette’s are cars but not all cars are Corvette’s

item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Hum4n01d
item.description:
Yeah, electronic music is a way to produce music but electronic is still a genre independent from that.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
But there’s a difference between stylistic categorization and classification of a specific medium of creation

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Hum4n01d
item.description:
I don’t think you understand what a genre is. The definition of a genre IS a category for music to go into…

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Aadam
item.description:
@Hum4n01d and @Peregrihn, lemme tell you what I think.

Electronic is NOT a genre, but it is a category that genres fit into.

The reason why I put that was because otherwise, the poll would be flooded with genres.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: iamtheCHiLDiSH
item.description:
tbf the only reason I chose pluck over lead is because you can get more variation with a pluck than a lead, but you give me a good lead and ill be gone for months doing work

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
Well there’s a difference between the types of categories music can be divided into. Genre is more of a stylistic category group and electronic isn’t a style. The Production process encompasses another way you can categorize music but it’s not stylistic like genre. Electronic music is the distinction that it was produced electronically, not “stylisticly electronic” (see the rationale?)

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Hum4n01d
item.description:
I think it’s fair to call electronic a genre. It’s a category that music can go into.

There are many sub genres that are more specific but genres are pretty arbitrary to begin with (at least the more general ones)

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
I don’t think you’re understanding what I’m trying to say. Electronic isn’t a genre. It’s a way to make music. There are way too many styles that come out of electronic production to group all those people together. (Also, Not all electronic music classified as EDM)

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

item.title: Just a few polls for you!
item.dc:creator: Aadam
item.description:
Well, I am trying to use subgenres, because otherwise there would be a flood of answers.

Read full topic
item.source: Just a few polls for you!

Since when is DnB not EDM?

Never. I am just clarifying it, because some people do not know.

El1011:

Some people do not know.
